frontmatter.title: O2 Beacon 3 - Orion
frontmatter.description: O2's latest flagship monopoles, Orion, are a mastermind in the mobile networking world, cramming two 5G carriers and tonnes of 4G bands into a single streetworks cabinet and monopole. It's a work of art.
